name: Debate Club
description: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.

passiveDescription.0: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>60%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.
passiveDescription.1: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>75%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.
passiveDescription.2: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>90%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.
passiveDescription.3: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>105%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.
passiveDescription.4: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to <cryo>120%</cryo> of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.
